snippet: As elected officials in Long Beach, N.Y. promised to rebuild the 76-year-old Boardwalk that was damaged during Hurricane Sandy, residents gathered to share memories.
abstract: Residents of Long Beach, NY, gather to reminisce and share memories of the 76-year-old Boardwalk, damaged during Hurricane Sandy; elected officials promise to rebuild the beloved structure and residents take wooden planks as keepsakes.
lead_paragraph: As elected officials in Long Beach, N.Y. promised to rebuild the 76-year-old Boardwalk that was damaged during Hurricane Sandy, residents gathered to share memories.

headline.seo: Long Beach, N.Y., Says Goodbye to Its Boardwalk
headline.main: A City Reminisces While Saying Goodbye, for Now, to Its Boardwalk
headline.print_headline: A City Reminisces While Saying Goodbye, for Now, to Its Boardwalk
